pages.text: The $(mob)Troll$() is a monster that spawns underground in $(thing)Forests$(). It uses its massive weapons to smash players on sight, and is immune to $(item)Arrows$().$(p)When exposed to sunlight, it permanently turns to stone. In this state, it can be broken with any $(item)Pickaxe$() to get $(item)Cobblestone$().
$(mob)Trolls$() drop $(item)Troll Leather$() of their respective type on death. It can be crafted into projectile-resistant armor.
$(mob)Trolls$() also drop $(item)Troll Tusks$() on death. It can be crafted into $(item)Bone Meal$() to fertilize crops.

$(mob)Trolls$() may also rarely drop their weapons on death, such as a $(item)Troll's Axe$(). There are multiple variants but all act identical, being a slow melee weapon that deals high damage.$(p)If a $(mob)Troll$() does not drop its weapon, it may drop pieces of it.
